title: Googleâ€™s Android Privacy Sandbox might help preserve user privacy
content:
Advertisements are everywhere. They’re in the streets, they’re in TV shows and movies, and they’re in our pockets on our smartphones. Google knows just how cagey some people can be when it comes to privacy, and the company has been making some efforts to help aid user privacy. Now though, Google has announced the Android

The post Google’s Android Privacy Sandbox might help preserve user privacy appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Android Privacy Sandbox is a new initiative from Google to help preserve user privacy, though it's unclear how it helps developers.
